segments.text: I am here to get my prescription filled .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Your prescription will be ready in twenty minutes .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Do you ever deliver prescriptions by mail ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , in fact , you can renew this prescription over the Internet and have it delivered to your home .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How should I take this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You should take it twice a day .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I avoid alcohol with this medication ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: You need something in your stomach when you take it . Don ’ t drink alcohol with this medication .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Should I expect any side effects ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sometimes you might feel dizzy , but that isn ’ t common .
segments.speaker: S2
